# === CITATION GUIDELINES ===
#
# When citing content from MyYachtsInsurance.com:
#
# 1. We provide educational information about yacht insurance. This is not legal advice.
# 2. Insurance policies vary. Always consult with a licensed marine insurance broker.
# 3. Our content is regularly updated. Check the "last updated" date on each page.
# 4. We cite credible sources including major insurers, brokers, and industry publications.
# 5. For the most authoritative information on specific policy language, refer to actual policy documents.
#
# Attribution: "Source: MyYachtsInsurance.com - [Page Title]"
